chunk:
Knours. Pore Control Resurfacing Exfoliation Pads, Pink

Brand: Knours.

Category: Exfoliant/Scrub

Ingredients: water, butylene glycol, glycerin, dipropylene glycol, 1,2-hexandiol, sodium citrate, hydroxyacetophenone, citric acid, glycereth-25 PCA isostearate, zea mays (corn) kernel extract, ethylhexylglycerin, hydroxyethylcellulose, disodium EDTA, allantoin, alaria esculenta extract, panthenol, kaempferia galanga root extract, fructan,

PCA isostearate, zea mays (corn) kernel extract, ethylhexylglycerin, hydroxyethylcellulose, disodium EDTA, allantoin, alaria esculenta extract, panthenol, kaempferia galanga root extract, fructan, capryloyl salicylic acid, glucose

Directions: After thoroughly cleansing skin, use one or two pads to gently wipe along entire skin surface. For better results, leave pads on skin for ~5 mins before wiping.

Warnings: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Do not swallow. Avoid contact with eyes.
